de.bioforscher.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.consensus

Class ConsensusAlignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.consensus.ConsensusAlignment

  • public class ConsensusAlignment
extends java.lang.Object
    A consensus alignment of same-sized StructuralMotifs can be used to cluster them according their geometric similarity in a multi-structure alignment manner as described in: 
    to be published
    NOTE: Copies of given StructuralMotifs will be used, so original structures are not altered.
